name: Dojo Assault
description:
Cut the rival clones down using your katana and decimate them using your gun and kunais. Survive for as long as you can to progress to the next level where enemies get faster, more accurate and more unforgiving.

Featuring

  • Brutal Cuts
  • Nasty Slashes
  • Deep Lacerations
  • Gnarly Stabs
  • Guts
  • Blood
  • Gunshots
  • Katana Skills
